Too bad that read me file is in swedish. Mount/burn. Use keygen while install. After you done that put the crack into C:\program\electronic arts\battlefield 2142

Then you have to put the default profile into My documents\Battlefield 2142 The two folders and the two files also to be found in the image when mounted.  Note! You cant use anything but the default profile.
Now you should be ready to try
Hope this will help you out.

HERE IT IS TRANSLATED THIS MAKES IT WORK 100% 	

install Battlefield 2142

1. RZR-2142 mount with PowerISO or similar

2nd install the game. Keygenerator found in the mount file in a folder.

3rd after installing the game again so we have 2 things
1.lägg the crack file into C: \ Program Files \ Electronic Arts \ Battlefield 2142

2nd you must add default profile. to do this you must:
Open the file located in the Crack in the mount file
add the 2 folders and the 2 files in My Documents \ Battlefield 2142

When you start the game, you should first just press login, you can not change the login information,
then press login. when error messages pop up, just press cancel
and then select the profile that are there.

Ive read comments, and alot of you seem to have trouble with account/crack, throughout all of razer BF2142. if you need help or to ask a question about how to get it working, email at
